Room.Name: Lyanden Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling east/west on Lyanden Road, just east of Forest Road.
Room.LongDescription: To the north and east you see a forbidding mountain range in the distance and occasionally feel a chill gust of wind that came down off the snow- covered peaks. Rumors speak of a race of giants who live there, and of course there are the mountain trolls. The Enchanted Forest is north of you.
